channel.title: Hamachi help?
channel.description:
Kay, I have hamachi, but, me being my stupid self... I didn't read the tut on how to use it.
Now, I can use hamachi, go on servers, join networks and what not.. I've figured that out.
My No-ip duc setup is really being weird, so I thought it might be easier to get ham. How can I put my server onto ham? What do I need to do?
And, after I get it on ham, can I finally use the ip instead of 127.0.0.1? :P thanks
-Under

item.title: Hamachi help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8ter sk8ter
item.description:
@sk8ter wrote:

alright, what you do is create a network. tell someone else the name and pass, they’ll join it. then tell them the ip thats at the top of the hamachi window, and tell them to go into moparscape, type a name and pass, and for the ip type that ip. Kay?

Read full topic
